instructions: Identify persons in an office environment video based on their role, if discernible. Use the provided labels.

persons.label: Office Worker
persons.description: A person working at a desk, using a computer, or engaged in typical office tasks.

persons.label: Presenter
persons.description: A person speaking or presenting to others, possibly using a whiteboard or screen.

persons.label: Meeting Attendee
persons.description: A person participating in a meeting, often seated around a table.

persons.label: Receptionist
persons.description: A person located at a front desk area.

persons.label: Generic Person
persons.description: Any other person visible in the office setting not clearly fitting another role.
